price: El Señor agraciará a los piadosos con los Jardines de las Delicias.
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
